00021 #include "GenericFileUpdater.h"

00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00025 GenericFileUpdater::GenericFileUpdater(const std::string& path) 
00026 { 
00027         fileHdr = ReadFileHeader(path);
00028         writer = new GenericFileWriter(&fileHdr, false);
00029         lastDataGrpOffset = FindLastDataGroupOffset();
00030         lastDataGrpDataSetCnt = GetLastDataGroupDataSetCnt(); 
00031 }
00032 
00033 GenericFileUpdater::~GenericFileUpdater() 
00034 {
00035         delete writer;
00036 }
00037 
00038 DataSetWriter* GenericFileUpdater::GetUpdateDataSetWriter(DataSetHeader& dataSetHdr)
00039 {
00040         DataSetHeader lastDataSetHdr;
00041         if(FindLastDataSetHeader(fileHdr, lastDataSetHdr))
00042         {
00043                 u_int32_t offset = 0;
00044                 if(dataSetHdr.GetName().compare(lastDataSetHdr.GetName()) == 0)
00045                 {
00046                         //overwrite last dataset
00047                         offset = lastDataSetHdr.GetHeaderStartFilePos();
00048                 }
00049                 else
00050                 {
00051                         //append dataset
00052                         offset = lastDataSetHdr.GetNextSetFilePos();
00053 
00054                         //increment data set count
00055                         IncrementDataSetCnt();
00056 
00057                 }
00058                 u_int32_t lastDataGrpIndex = fileHdr.GetDataGroupCnt() - 1;
00059                 writer->SeekFromBeginPos(offset);
00060                 return writer->GetDataGroupWriter(lastDataGrpIndex).CreateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00061         }
00062         return 0;
00063 }

00083 FileHeader GenericFileUpdater::ReadFileHeader(const std::string& path) const
00084 {
00085         GenericData gData;
00086         GenericFileReader reader;
00087         reader.SetFilename(path);
00088         reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00089         gData.Close();
00090         return gData.Header();
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool GenericFileUpdater::FindLastDataSetHeader(FileHeader& fileHdr, DataSetHeader& dataSetHdr) const
00094 {
00095         int32_t index = fileHdr.GetDataGroupCnt();
00096         if(index > 0)
00097         {
00098                 DataGroupHeader dataGrpHdr = fileHdr.GetDataGroup(index - 1);
00099                 index = dataGrpHdr.GetDataSetCnt();
00100                 if(index > 0)
00101                 {
00102                         dataSetHdr = dataGrpHdr.GetDataSet(index - 1);
00103                         return true;
00104                 }
00105 
00106         }
00107         return false;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void GenericFileUpdater::IncrementDataSetCnt()
00111 {
00112         lastDataGrpDataSetCnt++;
00113         u_int32_t currentPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00114         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(lastDataGrpOffset + 8);
00115         writer->Write(lastDataGrpDataSetCnt);
00116         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(currentPos);
00117 }
00118 
00119 u_int32_t GenericFileUpdater::GetLastDataGroupDataSetCnt()
00120 {
00121         DataGroupHdrIt begin;
00122         DataGroupHdrIt end;
00123         fileHdr.GetDataGroupIts(begin, end);
00124         while(begin != end)
00125         {
00126                 if(begin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0)
00127                 {
00128                         return begin->GetDataSetCnt();
00129                 }
00130                 begin++;
00131         }
00132         return 0;
00133 }
00134 
00135 u_int32_t GenericFileUpdater::FindLastDataGroupOffset()
00136 {
00137         DataGroupHdrIt begin;
00138         DataGroupHdrIt end;
00139         fileHdr.GetDataGroupIts(begin, end);
00140         u_int32_t currentOffset = fileHdr.GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00141         while(begin != end)
00142         {
00143                 if(begin->GetNextGroupPos() == 0)
00144                 {
00145                         break;
00146                 }
00147                 else
00148                 {
00149                         currentOffset = begin->GetNextGroupPos();
00150                 }
00151                 begin++;
00152         }
00153         return currentOffset;
00154 }
